title: Guide to the Ethereum Roadmap | Jon Charbonneau of Delphi Digital
description:
Jon Charbonneau, Research Analyst at Delphi Digital joins David to talk about his recent essay titled, "The Hitchhiker's Guide to Ethereum."

Proposer / Builder Separation (PBS)
Danksharding and ProtoDanksharding (DS + PDS)
Data Availability Sampling (DAS)

What the absolute HELL are these things? What do they mean for Ethereum? What's the common theme behind all of them? And what do they mean for ETH?

All of these questions answered and so much more in the livestream.
